ENTER
This container is designed for less radioactive Artefacts. You cannot use it to fully offset the damaging effects of radiation. Put the Artefact in a different container.
Labeled: a private channel
I got to the apartment, Shadows and Pavel were, Cube was not. But I found interesting about the notebook night incident in the laboratory... Karoche after all that happened, our friend went back to the lab. Apparently, so did not come out of there...\nBy the way there yet sink a strange - entry is repeated constantly. To record the conversation sort of military...\nWhat do you think?
I think that's what - you have to move. We're in trouble - our last conversation overheard. And maybe someone else knew about the Cube ... Maybe the one who let you tip me...\nIn general the eastern part of Pripyat is now occupied by a fit squad of mercenaries. They know what you're looking for the Cube in the apartment...\nWe must make them believe otherwise. You do not want trouble? You can try to merge the disinformation to the stalker network...\nTry to write in the chat via PDA: 'Cube for Sale, belonged to Shadows. The cordon around the Perimeter, in 8 hours.'\nWrite exactly as I wrote, then maybe they will think you already took the Cube ... Try.
Shadows: private channel
Blood Stone on the belt

moved from belt to pack

Where did you acquire such a strange weapon? Is this the work of Lanky!?\nI would not even attempt to undertake repairs on such a weapon as this.\nIf you wish to have it repaired - bring it back to Lanky at the Bar.\n He will take care of it for you..
